snippet.title: Draugen story trailer
snippet.description: Draugen is a first-person Fjord Noir mystery set in 1920s Norway, from the creators of Dreamfall Chapters. Coming May 29, 2019 to Windows PC via Steam and GOG.com. Coming to PlayStation 4 and Xbox One in 2019. Wish-list on Steam and GOG.com today: https://www.draugen.com/
